description:
Ethan is a gay guy who has always wanted to do porn.
He is not your stereotypical gay guy. who is all about his hair and clothes, and his hair did kind of drive me crazy when he filmed his two videos. I have a feeling the audience will pick that apart, but do know, we did get him to the salon! He looks muuuch better now!
So for these shots, he is sporting this hair cut that was shouting for a gay intervention!
He is versatile, but mostly bottoms since his cock, while not super long, is rather thick and meaty! A little too wide for the guys he has been with. He does love bottoming and fingers his hole to get himself over the top during the solo.
Ethan is a smart guy, dare I say a little nerdy, but given talking to many models about fast cars, sports, and pussy, he was a joy to hang around with and chat with.
He is kind of shy, so is very quiet during this video.
He will be back next week to do a tagteam oral with Shiloh and a guy that is a blast from the past...Gennaro! Ethan was NOT shy during the oral video, so my guess is Ethan will be one of those models we will see grow into an amazing performer!
title: Ethan - Solo
